      • queueTexture

        public static void queueTexture​(int x,
                                int y,
                                int width,
                                int height,
                                ITexture texture)
        Queues a texture for rendering.
        Parameters:
        x - the x position in pixels from the left of the window.
        y - the y position in pixels from the top of the window.
        width - the width in pixels.
        height - the height in pixels.
        texture - the texture to queue for rendering.
